      • processJournalEntry

        public void processJournalEntry(JournalEntry entry)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master. These entries follow the checkpoint entries.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to process to update the state of the master.
        Throws:
        IOException

                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException

      • start

        public void start(boolean isLeader)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master. Here, the master should initialize state and possibly start threads required for operation. If isLeader is true, the master should also initialize the journal and write the checkpoint file.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Master
        Overrides:
        start in class MasterBase
        Parameters:
        isLeader - if true, the master should behave as the leader master in the system. If false, the master should act as a standby master.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Stops the master. Here, anything created or started in Master.start(boolean) should be cleaned up and shutdown.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Master
        Overrides:
        stop in class MasterBase
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createRawTable

        public long createRawTable(TachyonURI path,
                  int columns,
                  ByteBuffer metadata)
                    throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                           InvalidPathException,
                           TableColumnException,
                           TableMetadataException,
                           IOException
        Creates a raw table. A table is a directory with sub-directories representing columns.
        Parameters:
        path - the path where the table is placed
        columns - the number of columns in the table
        metadata - additional metadata about the table
        Returns:
        the id of the table or IdUtils.INVALID_FILE_ID if path does not exist
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - when the path already represents a file
        InvalidPathException - when path is invalid
        TableColumnException - when number of columns is out of range
        TableMetadataException - when metadata size is too large
        IOException

      • updateRawTableMetadata

        public void updateRawTableMetadata(long tableId,
                          ByteBuffer metadata)
                            throws TableDoesNotExistException,
                                   TableMetadataException
        Updates the metadata of a table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the table to update
        metadata - The new metadata to update the table with
        Throws:
        TableDoesNotExistException - when no table has the specified id
        TableMetadataException - when metadata is too large

      • columnPath

        public TachyonURI columnPath(TachyonURI tablePath,
                    int column)
        Returns the path for the column in the table.
        Parameters:
        tablePath - the path of the table
        column - column number
        Returns:
        the column path

      • getRawTableId

        public long getRawTableId(TachyonURI path)
                   throws InvalidPathException,
                          TableDoesNotExistException,
                          IOException
        Gets the id of the table at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the table
        Returns:
        the id of the table
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - when path is invalid
        TableDoesNotExistException - when the path does not refer to a table
        IOException

      • getClientRawTableInfo

        public RawTableInfo getClientRawTableInfo(long id)
                                   throws InvalidPathException,
                                          TableDoesNotExistException
        Gets the raw table info associated with the given id, the raw table info format is defined in thrift.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the table
        Returns:
        the table info
        Throws:
        TableDoesNotExistException - when no table has the id
        InvalidPathException

      • getClientRawTableInfo

        public RawTableInfo getClientRawTableInfo(TachyonURI path)
                                   throws TableDoesNotExistException,
                                          InvalidPathException,
                                          IOException
        Gets the raw table info of the table at the given path, the raw table info format is defined in thrift.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the table
        Returns:
        the table info
        Throws:
        TableDoesNotExistException - when the path does not refer to a table
        InvalidPathException - when path is invalid
        IOException
